member.summary: Holds computed Guids for all types since class Guids are missing in Mono

member.summary: Hold all plugins regardless of interface for quick access through the computed key

member.name: F:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.Filters
member.summary:
The files that the plugin framework will look for. By default *.dll and *.exe
Use ClearPluginFilters and AddPluginFilter to manage files ot load. Note that you can use "MyNamespace.*.dll" etc as filters to reduce the amount of assemblies loaded.

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.#cctor
member.summary: Ctor - Setup for first usage

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.AddPluginFilter(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a new file search filter to use when plugins are loaded. If used it is common to first call ClearPluginFilters

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.ClearPluginFilters
member.summary: Removes all file search filter that are used when plugins are loaded.

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.RemovePluginFilter(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a specific file search filter

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.RegisterExport``1
member.summary:
Lets you register additional Exports into the plugin framework. This method have to be called prior to any usage of the plugin framework. After registration you will not be forced to have an export attribute on your plugin. You can get an instance by using the Composable.GetExport(s) method(s)
If used after first call to GetExport(s) you have to call recompose to load the new types.

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.AddMetaDataMapping``2
member.summary: Some types might demand a MetaDataExportAttribute.. Use this method to tell the plugin framework the default MetaDataExportAttribute to create when it is missing.

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.ReCompose
member.summary: Reload all types, will add new exports/imports if you have used registerexport or added new assemblies at runtime.

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.GetExport``1
member.summary: Will return a single instance the implements the interface T. Returns null if an exception is thrown, to get the exception use AddErrorAction method

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.GetExport``1(System.String)
member.summary:
Will return a single instance that has the Type name of the parameter passed in Returns null if an exception is thrown, to get the exception use AddErrorAction method
Warning: This method is slow, use the other overloads if possible!

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.GetExport``1(System.Type)
member.summary: Will return a single instance that match the Type passed in Returns null if an exception is thrown, to get the exception use AddErrorAction method

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.GetExports``1
member.summary: Will retrieve all exports found that implements the interface T

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.GetExportWithMetadata``2
member.summary: Will return a single instance the implements the interface T.

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.GetExportsWithMetadata``2
member.summary: Will retrieve all exports found that implements the interface T

member.summary: Will load all assemblies in the location. Use searchOption to include subfolder as well.

member.name: M:XSockets.Plugin.Framework.Composable.LoadAssembly(System.String)
member.summary: Loads additional assemblies. Will be used for scenarios of runtime re-composition Returns false if load failed.

member.summary: Loads exported types.... This have to be called after LoadAssemblyInterfaceExports

member.summary: If not using GetExport or GetExports you can use Compose to satisfy all imports of an object
